kenticocommunity.qandaanswerdata.QAndAAnswerDataContent:
Xperience by Kentico doesn't support this out-of-the-box yet. We will be working on feature updates to the Form Builder soon, so [share your feedback with us](https://roadmap.kentico.com/tabs/5-released) to help us cover the scenarios you encounter.
That said, you can customize the Admin UI to export to CSV or XLSX.
Take a look at the Kentico Community Portal which has [an example of this for newsletter recipient lists](https://github.com/Kentico/community-portal/blob/v30.0.0.0/src/Kentico.Community.Portal.Admin/Features/RecipientLists/RecipientListOverviewExtender.cs#L66). It even has a generalized ["data export" React component](https://github.com/Kentico/community-portal/blob/v30.0.0.0/src/Kentico.Community.Portal.Admin/Client/src/components/DataExportComponent.tsx) you can copy into your project to get you started.
